title: EU split on child vaccination | Podcast of the Network story
description: Should all children be vaccinated against Covid-19? Many kids test positive, vaccination campaigns in member states have stalled and variants of the coronavirus are causing confusion. Yet the subject
cleaned_text: EU split on child vaccination | Podcast of the Network story by Euranet Plus Central published on 2021-12-15T23:31:24Z Should all children be vaccinated against Covid-19? Many kids test positive, vaccination campaigns in member states have stalled and variants of the coronavirus are causing confusion. Yet the subject is being hotly debated across the EU. Journalists from our European radio network tell the story. Read and listen to our #newsAudioStory at https://euranetplus-inside.eu/eu-split-on-child-vaccination-network-story/ Genre News & Politics
